short_description: Adjustable & Multi-Use Design: This bed sit ups bar features four versatile mounting combinations using the pressure bar, cloth belt, door buckle, hook, and fixing clip, allowing you to securely anchor it to beds, doors, or other stable surfaces for effective core workouts anytime.

Perfect for Busy Lifestyles: Ideal for young mothers, office workers, or travelers who lack gym time, this portable sit up fitness aid lets you tone your abs before bed or right after waking up—no equipment or space needed beyond your own room.

Comfortable & Hygienic Materials: The foam-covered steel rod and washable nylon straps ensure a soft grip and easy maintenance, making your home abdominal assist trainer both skin-friendly and simple to keep clean after repeated use.

Compact & Travel-Ready Kit: Includes 1 foam pressure rod (approx. 11.8 in), 1 ribbon fixing clip, 1 hook, and 1 door buckle—all lightweight and packable, so you can maintain your fitness routine whether at home, in the office, or on the go.
